direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve rewards history but for different types of products (locked vs. flexible).
Both methods access and retrieve historical records related to locked products.
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to locked product operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for sending signed requests.
Retrieving the locked product list can be a prerequisite to accessing locked rewards history.
Both methods involve verifying the response format and handling potential exceptions.
